channel.title: A few very hard questions
channel.description:
I'm using a reapage scape allstar base, which i've modified quite alot.
I was wondering if:
1) There is an easy way to add levels to the wilderness, because mine simply states "safe" and "wild"
2) There is an easy way to make a proper vengeance without using the lunar tab (mines just a button which deals damage in an area around me)
3) There is a way to make pvp combat 1 on 1 Thanks for any help you can give :)

item.title: A few very hard questions
item.dc:creator: @skinzoskinz skinzoskinz
item.description:
@skinzoskinz wrote:

I’m using a reapage scape allstar base, which i’ve modified quite alot.

I was wondering if:

  1. There is an easy way to add levels to the wilderness, because mine simply states “safe” and “wild”

  2. There is an easy way to make a proper vengeance without using the lunar tab (mines just a button which deals damage in an area around me)

  3. There is a way to make pvp combat 1 on 1
    Thanks for any help you can give
